inclusion.criterion: NAF cytology testing is beneficial by physician
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Medical condition/psychiatric conditions making subjects a poor candidate for study
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Open cutaneous wounds or atopic dermatitis in the area of the nipple-areolar complex
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: No or inverted nipple on the breast unfit for fluid collection
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Significant prior surgery in the area of the nipple-areolar complex
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Participation in an investigational drug or device study less than 30 days prior to enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy, childbirth, or lactation less than 90 days prior to enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Acute illness, including taking antibiotics, analgesics, antipyretics and/or cold medications less than 7 days prior to enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a known case of Acromegaly who underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. He takes only vitamin D and multivitamins after his surgery.
